title: US forces hit Islamic State militants in Nigeria after Trump warnings
shortDescription: President Trump said "numerous perfect strikes" had hit Islamic State militants in the West African nation of Nigeria.

title: Trump rings in Christmas with a sack full of social media posts
shortDescription: Trump heralded Christmas with messages criticizing 'Radical Left Scum' and promoting the country's economic growth.

title: Kennedy Center’s Christmas Eve jazz concert canceled over Trump name
shortDescription: The musician who leads the annual event canceled it because of the move to put President Donald Trump’s name on the center without approval from Congress.

title: Trump takes NORAD Santa calls from kids. Here's what he said.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump participated in NORAD's Santa calls on Christmas Eve, speaking to kids from across the country.

title: President Trump takes calls for Santa Claus
shortDescription: President Trump and First Lady Melania fielded NORAD Santa calls on Christmas Eve, answering calls from children asking about when Santa is coming.

title: Trump-backed candidate wins Honduras' presidential election
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threw his support behind Asfura, 67, a politician and businessman who is the former mayor of the capital Tegucigalpa.

title: Trump administration finds a 'million' new Epstein documents, DOJ says
shortDescription: Prosecutors in New York discovered a million more Epstein documents, the Justice Department said, and may need weeks to vet and disclose them.

title: Trump gathers group to tackle beef prices
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has gathered a team of economic and industry advisors to address soaring beef prices and broader inflation concerns. The group will focus on strategies to lower the cost of ground beef and provide relief to American families facing rising grocery bills.

title: Cattle ranchers hit by Trump's push for lower beef prices
shortDescription: High prices for a range of goods, including beef, coffee and electricity, have upset consumers and frustrated Trump.

title: Judge sides with Trump on H-1B visa fees
shortDescription: A judge upheld Trump's authority to impose a $100,000 fee on H-1B visas, which are popular among tech and universities to hire skilled workers.

title: What is Donald Trump's approval rating? See year-end polls
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is ending 2025 facing an ongoing controversy about Jeffrey Epstein. What is his approval rating? See the polls.

title: Trump administration offers $3,000, plane ticket for self-deportations
shortDescription: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem announced the "home for the holidays" initiative, offering a $3,000 payment and a plane ticket for migrants to leave the country voluntarily.

title: New Epstein files include mentions of Trump, his trips on Epstein jet
shortDescription: After Justice Department releases thousands of new Epstein files, Democrats ask, "What else is the DOJ hiding? This is a White House cover-up."

title: 3 Trump revelations in Epstein files
shortDescription: New Epstein files reveal President Donald Trump’s jet trips, Mar-a-Lago subpoena and photo with Ghislaine Maxwell.

title: Supreme Court won't let Trump deploy National Guard in Chicago
shortDescription: In a rare loss for Trump at the high court, the justices kept in place a temporary hold on the use of National Guard troops to quell protests in Chicago.

title: See more Epstein files that mention Donald Trump
shortDescription: The Epstein files released by the U.S. Justice Dept. on Dec. 23, 2025, contain several references to Donald Trump.

title: Why does the US want Greenland? What Trump has said
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said 'we need Greenland for national security' and denies it is due to the minerals there. The island is a territory of Denmark

title: US rep sues Trump, calls Kennedy Center renaming 'flagrant violation'
shortDescription: Ohio Rep. Joyce Beatty sued President Donald Trump and members of the board of the Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts over the center's renaming.

title: Trump says US needs Greenland
shortDescription: Trump named Louisiana Governor Jeff Landry special envoy to Greenland, drawing renewed criticism from both Denmark and Greenland.

title: Greenland leader 'sad' over Trump’s special envoy appointment
shortDescription: President Trump has renewed his interest in acquiring Greenland by appointing Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry to be his envoy for the Arctic island.
